data.text: Let us now praise famous men,
The Lord hath wrought great glory by them
Such as did bear rule in their kingdoms,
Leaders of the people by their counsels,
Such as found out musical tunes,
Rich men furnished with ability,
All these were honoured in their generations,
There be of them, that have left a name behind them,
And some there be, which have no memorial;
But these were merciful men,
With their seed shall continually remain a good inheritance,
Their seed standeth fast, and their children for their sakes.
Their seed shall remain for ever,
Their bodies are buried in peace;
The people will tell of their wisdom,
Enoch pleased the Lord, and was translated,
Noah was found perfect and righteous;
An everlasting covenant was made with him,
Abraham was a great father of many people:
Who kept the law of the most High,
Therefore he assured him by an oath,
With Isaac did he establish likewise (for Abraham his fatherâ€™s sake)
And made it rest upon the head of Jacob.
